item.title: Pip and Conda Change Repo
item.description: Pip Change Repository Config Use pip config to configure PyPi repository on user or global level: pip config [--user] set global.index https://my-company/nexus/repository/pypi-group/pypi pip config [--user] set global.index-url https://my-company/nexus/repository/pypi-group/simple pip config [--user] set global.trusted-host my-company where index-url is used by pip install, and index is used by pip search. Use pip config -v list to find the path of the configuration file. Famous Mirror Repository aliyun's mirror: https://mirrors.
